member.name: T:Warcraft.IGameLogic
member.summary: Bridges the player and the GameModel.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IGameLogic.Build(Warcraft.Building,Warcraft.SelfMovingObject)
member.returns: True if the building was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IGameLogic.Train(Warcraft.SelfMovingObject,Warcraft.Building)
member.param: Building where the unit should be trained.
member.returns: True if the training was successful.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IGameLogic.MoveTo(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Moves a unit to a given location.
member.param: Where the unit should move to.
